Submodules

pathoperation.createfolder module

pathoperation.createfolder.create_folder_for_file_if_needed(path_file)[source]

Given a file with it’s path, if the directory for this file doesn’t exist, created the directory

Parameters:

path_file (str) – the file name and it’s directory to reside

pathoperation.createfolder.create_folder_if_needed(base_dir, folder)[source]

If a new folder doesn’t exist, create the folder

Parameters:

  • base_dir (str) – parent directory where the folder to be created

  • folder (str) – The new folder name
